original_text: Shalmaneser, the king of Assyria, came to attack Hoshea in Samaria. Hoshea agreed to accept Shalmaneser's authority. Israel had to pay a lot of money as taxes to Shalmaneser each year.
korean_text: 앗수르의 왕 살만에셀이 올라오니 호세아가 그에게 종이 되어 조공을 드리더니

sentences.original_text: came to attack Hoshea in Samaria.
Hoshea agreed to accept Shalmaneser's authority.
Israel had to pay a lot of money as taxes
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘은 많은 돈을 세금으로 내야 했습니다.
